meanings.definition: A rich, sweet cake, typically layered with cream or fruit.
meanings.sent1: The gateau at the party was delicious and had layers of cream.
meanings.sent2: I love to bake gateau with fresh fruit and cream for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The gateau was so sweet, it made my teeth ache!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet and layered as a gateau.
meanings.sent5: The gateau was a masterpiece of sweetness and layers.

meanings.definition: A type of dessert made with layers of sponge cake and cream.
meanings.sent1: The gateau served at the restaurant was light and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: My favorite gateau has layers of sponge cake and creamy frosting.
meanings.sent3: The gateau looked like a fluffy cloud on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and airy as a gateau.
meanings.sent5: The gateau melted in my mouth like a dreamy cloud of sweetness.
